Model after the LamaParama example in https://sneumann.github.io/xcms/articles/xcms.html instead. ✅ 3) also see if you can understand Lama better from https://sneumann.github.io/xcms/articles/xcms.html and change the description that is a bit unclear. ✅ 4) missing side by side of gplot(LamaParama) and original from XCMS.
